comment.body: You can also double fav your post lel

You creepy cool guy. I better over my shoulder then huh? That is really funny too.
Could you make a paragraph size summary also? I think it will be most useful, like in academic papers.

Cooking and Cleaning? lol

A video publishing zite that has some channel and subscription functionality like YT would be killer. I think it is years ahead because it would require to send videos over BT.
What if Capitalism will allow people to share almost everything beautiful for free! Free capitalist hugs for you!

"Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the YHWH thy *Elohim* is with thee whithersoever thou goest."

Book of Joshua Chapter 1 verse 9

!!!NEVER USE YOUR REAL PICTURE ON ZERONET OR INTERNET!!!

This is to be a pseudanonymous network and you might be doxxed or get some negative repercussions.

The MultiUser plugin offers change between users. So you can post more on ZeroTorrent. To enable it, rename ZeroNet/plugins/disabled-Multiuser to ZeroNet/plugins/Multiuser then restart ZeroNet

I was playing around with it but didn't make it change between my original user and new user yet.

Those are great zites! I didn't know about Streams and TV Episodes, thanks!

Suzo, you should look into 0list for the user that posted about Play for the first time. You probably need to look back several months.

Can you please explain how to install them? Can you confirm it is only unzip to the plugin folder and restart ZN? I will also add it to my thread on ZeroTalk:

[How to Bypass ZeroTorrent or ZeroTalk quotas by creating new user accounts \[ZeroTalk Topic\]](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:3_164W1rFVD9Bm7poGJWvjVUjvkbhhFC5nnt)
We need feed tools soon, it won't be long until unpleasantness comes about.

It is not ready to fly yet, but soon.

Imagine if every 13 yo was posting a comment about Pokemon GO and then trolling everyone else by using curse words. That could easily make some zites unusable.
How is that a Hub? It asks for merger when I visit it.

Don't play the victim. You can do it. Make a list of reasons why you use it and work on that. One serious step forward is to install Linux

http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerolinux.bit

I use Ubuntu Trusty, but you can try the new longterm support version 16.04 XenialXerus
